text: Hello! I am the PBR VITS Chatbot. I can provide detailed information about departments like CSE and ECE, admissions, placements, facilities, and everything related to PBR Visvodaya Institute of Technology and Science.

PBR Visvodaya Institute of Technology and Science (PBR VITS) is a private engineering institution established in 1998 in Kavali, Andhra Pradesh. It operates under Visvodaya Educational Society and offers undergraduate and postgraduate programs in engineering and management.
PBR VITS was established in 1998. The Visvodaya Educational Society behind the institution has been contributing to education since 1952.

The vision of PBR VITS is to provide quality technical education and develop competent engineers with innovation and ethical values. Its mission focuses on academic excellence, research, industry interaction, and holistic student development.
PBR VITS is located at Visvodaya Campus, Udayagiri Road, Kavali, Nellore District, Andhra Pradesh, India.
The college is affiliated with Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University Anantapur (JNTUA). It is approved by AICTE and accredited by NAAC.

The Computer Science and Engineering (CSE) department focuses on programming, software development, artificial intelligence, machine learning, data science, web technologies, and emerging computing technologies. It includes computer labs, project development facilities, and placement-oriented training.

The Electronics and Communication Engineering (ECE) department focuses on communication systems, embedded systems, VLSI design, signal processing, and electronics hardware labs. Students gain practical exposure through projects, workshops, and lab experiments.
The Electrical and Electronics Engineering (EEE) department covers power systems, electrical machines, control systems, and renewable energy systems with laboratory training and industrial exposure.
The Mechanical Engineering department covers subjects like thermodynamics, manufacturing, design engineering, and machine tools with practical lab sessions and workshop facilities.
The Civil Engineering department focuses on structural engineering, construction technology, environmental engineering, and surveying with lab and field exposure.
The AI & ML specialization focuses on artificial intelligence, deep learning, neural networks, data analytics, and intelligent systems.
The Internet of Things (IoT) specialization focuses on connected systems, embedded devices, smart applications, and sensor-based technologies.
The MBA program focuses on business administration, marketing, finance, human resource management, and entrepreneurship development.
The MCA program focuses on computer applications, software development, database systems, and IT management.
M.Tech programs are offered in selected engineering specializations and focus on advanced technical knowledge and research.
B.Tech admissions are through AP EAPCET counseling. M.Tech admissions require PGECET or GATE qualification. MBA and MCA admissions are based on AP ICET scores.
Approximate total B.Tech tuition fee ranges from ₹1.6–₹1.8 lakhs. PG course fees vary by program and academic year.
The Placement Cell conducts campus recruitment training, aptitude sessions, mock interviews, and placement drives. Recruiters include TCS, Wipro, Infosys, Tech Mahindra, and other IT companies.
Campus Recruitment Training (CRT) includes aptitude preparation, technical skill enhancement, communication skills, and interview preparation.
The campus provides academic blocks, computer labs, electronics labs, mechanical workshops, library, Wi-Fi connectivity, seminar halls, and digital resources.
Separate hostel facilities are available for boys and girls with essential amenities.
Transport services are available for students from nearby towns and villages.
Students participate in sports, cultural programs, technical fests, seminars, and extracurricular activities.
Eligible students may apply for government scholarships and fee reimbursement schemes as per Andhra Pradesh policies.
The college follows strict anti-ragging policies as per AICTE regulations.
Semester exams, academic schedules, and results are published on the official website.
For official social media pages and updates, visit the official website https://pbrvits.ac.in/ and check the footer section.
The official website of PBR VITS is https://pbrvits.ac.in/ where you can find notifications, admissions, placements, and academic information.
